name: novelistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or like a novel (= a long printed story about imaginary characters and events): The TV family drama had a novelistic feel to it. This book, her most famous, was a brilliant end to her novelistic career.
More examplesFewer examplesThe account is meant to be a memoir, but all too often it drifts into a novelistic style.Her novelistic story of the life of the famous sculptor is a masterpiece.He has brought a fresh new approach to the novelistic conventions of place and character.
